product14.title: Chocozone 360 Dancing Robot with Lights & Music Toys
product14.description: Chocozone robot toy has dual-wheel foot balancing, which can easily navigate his surroundings. With this dancing robot, you can teach your kids about different parts of the body, colors, and moves. Little robot action with its arms and legs move with the song, 360-degree spinning which develops excellent motor skills and boosts hand to eye coordination while having fun with a walking robot.
